s06 ​

trasition ​

컴포넌트가 DOM 에 나타나고 사라질때 애니메이션을 적용하기 위해 사용 transitionGroup

if show component 토글

AppAlert.vue

transition 감싸기 나타날때 클래스 나타난상태 감출때

기본 트랜지션

vue
<template>
  <transition>
    <div v-if="show" class="app-alert alert" :class="styleClass" role="alert">
      {{ message }}
    </div>
  </transition>
</template>

<script setup>
import { computed } from "vue";

const props = defineProps({
  show: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false,
  },
  message: {
    type: String,
    required: true,
  },
  type: {
    type: String,
    default: "error",
    validator: (value) => ["success", "error"].includes(value),
  },
});
const typeStyle = computed(() => (props.type === "error" ? "alert-danger" : "alert-primary"));
</script>

<style scoped>
.app-alert {
  position: fixed;
  top: 10px;
  right: 10px;
}

.v-enter-from,
.v-leave-to {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(-30px);
}

.v-enter-activie,
.v-leave-action {
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
}

.v-enter-to,
.v-leave-from {
  opacity: 1;
}
</style>

슬라이드 효과

vue
<template>
  <transition name="slide">
    <div v-if="show" class="app-alert alert" :class="typeStyle" role="alert">
      {{ message }}
    </div>
  </transition>
</template>

<script setup>
import { computed } from "vue";

const props = defineProps({
  show: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false,
  },
  message: {
    type: String,
    required: true,
  },
  type: {
    type: String,
    default: "error",
    validator: (value) => ["success", "error"].includes(value),
  },
});
const typeStyle = computed(() => (props.type === "error" ? "alert-danger" : "alert-primary"));
</script>

<style scoped>
.app-alert {
  position: fixed;
  top: 10px;
  right: 10px;
}

.slide-enter-from,
.v-leave-to {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(-30px);
}

.slide-enter-active,
.slide-leave-active {
  transition: all 0.5s ease;
}

.slide-enter-to,
.slide-leave-from {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0px);
}
</style>

transitionGroup 컴포넌트 - 삽입 변경 순서 변경

  1. 수정을 여러번 했을때

  2. 호출 횟수에 따라 alert-box 여러번 출력 처리

js
defineProps({
  items: Array,
});

4.쌓이는 스낵바

vue
<template>
  <div>
    <h2>게시글 수정</h2>
    <hr class="my-4" />
    <PostForm v-model:title="form.title" v-model:content="form.content" @submit.prevent="edit">
      <template #actions>
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger" @click="goDetailPage">취소</button>
        <button class="btn btn-primary">수정</button>
      </template>
    </PostForm>
    <AppAlert :items="alerts" />
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from "vue";
import { useRoute, useRouter } from "vue-router";
import { getPostById, updatePost } from "@/api/posts";
import PostForm from "@/components/posts/PostForm.vue";
import AppAlert from "@/components/AppAlert.vue";

const route = useRoute();
const router = useRouter();
const id = route.params.id;

const form = ref({
  title: null,
  content: null,
});
const fetchPost = async () => {
  try {
    const { data } = await getPostById(id);
    setForm(data);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(error);
    vAlert(error.message);
  }
};
const setForm = ({ title, content }) => {
  form.value.title = title;
  form.value.content = content;
};
fetchPost();
const edit = async () => {
  try {
    await updatePost(id, { ...form.value });
    // router.push({ name: 'PostDetail', params: { id } });
    vAlert("수정이 완료되었습니다!", "success");
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(error);
    vAlert(error.message);
  }
};

const goDetailPage = () => router.push({ name: "PostDetail", params: { id } });

// alert
const alerts = ref([]);
const vAlert = (message, type = "error") => {
  alerts.value.push({ message, type });
  setTimeout(() => {
    alerts.value.shift();
  }, 2000);
};
</script>
vue
<template>
  <div class="app-alert">
    <TransitionGroup name="slide">
      <div v-for="({ message, type }, index) in items" :key="index" class="alert" :class="typeStyle(type)" role="alert">
        {{ message }}
      </div>
    </TransitionGroup>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
defineProps({
  items: Array,
});
const typeStyle = (type) => (type === "error" ? "alert-danger" : "alert-primary");
</script>

<style scoped>
.app-alert {
  position: fixed;
  top: 10px;
  right: 10px;
}

.slide-enter-from,
.slide-leave-to {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(-30px);
}
.slide-enter-active,
.slide-leave-active {
  transition: all 0.5s ease;
}
.slide-enter-to,
.slide-leave-from {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0px);
}
</style>

Teleport 컴포넌트 : Modal 만들기 ​

step1 ​

js
/components/AppModal.vue
/components/posts/PostItem.vue
/views/posts/PostListView.vue

1./components/AppModal.vue wrapper 영역 div v-if show props 로 보이게 하기 modal 안쪽 영역 show d-block 으로 보이게 하기 닫기 버튼 클릭시 emit('close') 이벤트 발생 시키기 slot header title body actions 만들기

2./components/posts/PostItem.vue

3./views/posts/PostListView.vue emit close 처리 slot 에 값 전달 modalTitle, modalContent, modalCreatedAt

  • /components/AppModal.vue
vue
<template>
  <div v-if="show">
    <div class="modal-backdrop fade show"></div>
    <!-- Modal -->
    <div class="modal fade show d-block" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">
      <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
          <slot name="header">
            <div class="modal-header">
              <h1 class="modal-title fs-5" id="exampleModalLabel">{{ title }}</h1>
              <button
                type="button"
                class="btn-close"
                data-bs-dismiss="modal"
                aria-label="Close"
                @click="$emit('close')"
              ></button>
            </div>
          </slot>
          <div class="modal-body">
            <slot></slot>
          </div>
          <div class="modal-footer">
            <slot name="actions"></slot>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>
<script setup>
defineProps({
  show: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false,
  },
  title: String,
});
defineEmits(["close"]);
</script>

<style scoped></style>
  • /components/posts/PostItem.vue
vue
<template>
  <AppCard>
    <h5 class="card-title">{{ title }}</h5>
    <p class="card-text">
      {{ content }}
    </p>
    <p class="text-muted">{{ createdAt }}</p>
    <template #footer>
      <div class="d-flex flex-row-reverse">
        <button class="btn p-0" @click.stop="$emit('modal')">
          <i class="bi bi-emoji-sunglasses"></i>
        </button>
      </div>
    </template>
  </AppCard>
</template>

<script setup>
import AppCard from "@/components/AppCard.vue";
defineProps({
  title: {
    type: String,
    required: true,
  },
  content: {
    type: String,
  },
  createdAt: {
    type: [String, Date, Number],
  },
});
defineEmits(["modal"]);
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped></style>
  • /views/posts/PostListView.vue
vue
<template>
  <div>
    <h2>게시글 목록</h2>
    <hr class="my-4" />
    <PostFilter v-model:title="params.title_like" v-model:limit="params._limit" />
    <hr class="my-4" />
    <AppGrid :items="posts">
      <template v-slot="{ item }">
        <PostItem
          :title="item.title"
          :content="item.content"
          :created-at="item.createdAt"
          @click="goPage(item.id)"
          @modal="openModal(item)"
        ></PostItem>
      </template>
    </AppGrid>

    <AppPagination :current-page="params._page" :page-count="pageCount" @page="(page) => (params._page = page)" />

    <AppModal :show="show" @close="closeModal">
      <template #default>
        <div class="row g-3">
          <div class="col-3 text-muted">제목</div>
          <div class="col-9">{{ modalTitle }}</div>
          <div class="col-3 text-muted">내용</div>
          <div class="col-9">{{ modalContent }}</div>
          <div class="col-3">작성일</div>
          <div class="col-3 text-muted">{{ modalCreatedAt }}</div>
          <div class="col-9"></div>
        </div>
      </template>
      <template #actions>
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal" @click="closeModal()">닫기</button>
      </template>
    </AppModal>

    <template v-if="posts && posts.length > 0">
      <hr class="my-5" />
      <AppCard>
        <PostDetailView :id="posts[0].id"></PostDetailView>
      </AppCard>
    </template>

    <button type="button" @click="openModal">click</button>
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import PostItem from "@/components/posts/PostItem.vue";
import PostDetailView from "@/views/posts/PostDetailView.vue";
import PostFilter from "@/components/posts/PostFilter.vue";
import AppPagination from "@/components/AppPagination.vue";
import AppCard from "@/components/AppCard.vue";
import AppGrid from "@/components/AppGrid.vue";
import { getPosts } from "@/api/posts";
import { ref, watchEffect } from "vue";
import { useRouter } from "vue-router";
import { computed } from "@vue/reactivity";
import AppModal from "@/components/AppModal.vue";

const router = useRouter();
const posts = ref([]);
const params = ref({
  _sort: "createdAt",
  _order: "desc",
  _page: 1,
  _limit: 3,
  title_like: "",
});
// pagination
const totalCount = ref(0);
const pageCount = computed(() => Math.ceil(totalCount.value / params.value._limit));
const fetchPosts = async () => {
  try {
    const { data, headers } = await getPosts(params.value);
    posts.value = data;
    totalCount.value = headers["x-total-count"];
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(error);
  }
};
watchEffect(fetchPosts);
// fetchPosts();
const goPage = (id) => {
  // router.push(`/posts/${id}`);
  router.push({
    name: "PostDetail",
    params: {
      id,
    },
  });
};
//modal
const show = ref(false);
const modalTitle = ref("");
const modalContent = ref("");
const modalCreatedAt = ref("");

const openModal = ({ title, content, createdAt }) => {
  show.value = true;
  modalTitle.value = title;
  modalContent.value = content;
  modalCreatedAt.value = createdAt;
};
const closeModal = () => (show.value = false);
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped></style>

step2 ​

v-model 로 작동하도록 수정

1./components/AppModal.vue AppModal v-model + computed 로 구현 defineProps(['modelValue']) eventEmits(['update:modelValue']) close 버튼 @click="$event('update:modelValue', false)"

Pager
Previous page공통 컴포넌트
Next page재사용성
